body_html: I agree. My only concern was that, given that the reference for the method is the Sutskever paper and there is no documentation to explain the difference, the current implementation could be a potential "gotcha" for folks moving to PyTorch from other frameworks.
body_text: I agree. My only concern was that, given that the reference for the method is the Sutskever paper and there is no documentation to explain the difference, the current implementation could be a potential "gotcha" for folks moving to PyTorch from other frameworks.
body: I agree. My only concern was that, given that the reference for the method is the Sutskever paper and there is no documentation to explain the difference, the current implementation could be a potential _"gotcha"_ for folks moving to PyTorch from other frameworks.
